site.name: Bharat Success Academy
site.description: Premier coaching institute for UPSC, MPSC, Army, and Police examinations

hero.title: Your Path to Success Begins Here
hero.subtitle: Premier institute for Civil Services, Defense, and Police examinations

intro.title: Why Choose Bharat Success Academy?
intro.content: At Bharat Success Academy, we focus on comprehensive development of aspirants through personalized mentoring, quality study materials, and regular performance assessment. Our experienced faculty, most of whom are former civil servants and defense personnel, provide practical insights beyond theoretical knowledge.

courses.title: Our Courses
courses.subtitle: Comprehensive coaching programs for various competitive examinations

faculty.title: Our Expert Faculty
faculty.subtitle: Learn from the best in the field

toppers.title: Our Achievers

updates.title: Latest Updates
updates.subtitle: Stay informed about our recent activities and announcements

gallery.title: Gallery
gallery.subtitle: Glimpses of our activities and achievements

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.content: To prepare candidates holistically for competitive examinations by focusing on conceptual clarity, analytical skills, and personality development.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.content: To be the most trusted name in competitive exam coaching across India, known for quality education, ethical practices, and consistent results.

history.title: Our Journey
history.content: Established in 2010 by Dr. Rajesh Sharma, a former civil servant, Bharat Success Academy started with a small batch of UPSC aspirants. Over the years, we have expanded to multiple competitive examinations while maintaining our focus on quality education and personalized mentoring.
